H0.text: Horatio was a legendary Roman hero who defended a bridge against which army. Gaul

H1.text: Horatio was a legendary Roman hero who defended a bridge against which army. Carthaginian

H2.text: Horatio was a legendary Roman hero who defended a bridge against which army. Samnite

H3.text: Horatio was a legendary Roman hero who defended a bridge against which army. Etruscan

A4.text: Horatius defended the Pons Sublicius from the invading army of Etruscan King Lars Porsena
